ns2:data.ns2:text: ابن عنين, محمد بن نصر الله (1233-1154).
Ibn ʻUnayn, Muḥammad ibn Naṣr Allāh, 1154-1233.

ns2:work.ns2:title: Aʻyān al-qarn al-thālith ʻashar fī al-fikr wa-al-siyāsah wa-al-ijtīmaʻ.

Dimašq wa al-Quds fī al-ʿišrīnāt / taʾlīf H̲alīl Mardam Bak ; šaraḥahu wa qaddama lahu ʿAdnān Mardam Bak
Diwan Halil Mardum Beg. Quaddama lahu ... Gamil Saliba ... Asrafa 'ala tab'ini wa'allaqa 'alayhi ... 'Adnan Mardum Beg.
Dīwān / Ibn ʿUnayn Šaraf ad-Dīn Abī al-Maḥāsin Muḥammad Ibn Naṣr al-mašhūr bi Ibn ʿUnayn al-Anṣārī ad-Dimašqī ; taḥqīq H̲alīl Mardam Bak
